overview: Bridgette Kerkove just can't make up her mind. Her boyfriend has proposed to her, yet her date book is filled up. She turns to her friends for help but gets nowhere. When she asks Calli Cox, she gets a lot more than friendly advice. Nakita Kash is simply too busy satisfying her carnal cravings and Autumn Haze likes her afternoon romps outdoors too much to be bothered to lend an ear. Bridgette is left to her own devices to solve the dilemma, what will she ever do?
title: Stuck On You
